DOC.brief_title: Safety Pharmacokinetic Comparison Cilostazol SR IR Formulations Healthy Korean Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy male female volunteer age 19 55 within 20 % ideal body weight , without congenital abnormality chronic disease Female subject show positive result serum pregnancy test study , childbearing potential agree use one follow medically accept method contraception entire period study : abstinence , document tubal ligation least 1 year enrollment study , document placement intrauterine device proven failure rate < 1 % per year , double barrier method ( spermicide plus male condom female diaphragm ) . History cardiovascular , pulmonary , renal , endogenous , gastrointestinal , hematologic , neurologic hemorrhagic disease ; Clinically significant finding routine laboratory ( hematology , serum chemistry urinalysis ) ECG test ; Use prescription drug 14 day immediately prior start study potential interact study medication ; Use substance could induce CYP3A4 synthesis ( eg , St. John 's wort , herbal medication ) .
